\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	X \& Y \& Z \& {X[1]} \\
	{X'} \& {Y'} \& {Z'} \& {X'[1]}
	\arrow["u", from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["f", from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["v", from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["g", from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["w", from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["h", dashed, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{f[1]}", from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{u'}", from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{v'}", from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{w'}", from=2-3, to=2-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
